description: Counterbalanced numbers: Composite n such that phi(n)/(sigma(n)-n) is an integer.
comments: q=A000010(n)/A001065(n) is integer and n is composite.
links: Donovan Johnson, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (PARI) is(n)=!isprime(n) && n>1 && eulerphi(n)%(sigma(n)-n)==0 \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jan 02 2014
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jul 22 2000
